0.1: less than 6 tenths of sky covered by low thin clouds at height nn (reported cloud height)
0.2: less than 6 tenths of sky covered by low clouds at height nn (reported cloud height)
0.3: less than 6 tenths of sky covered by low thick clouds at height nn (reported cloud height)
0.-: No clouds visible due to obscuring phenomena

less than 6 tenths covered by high thin clouds

2.2: less than 6 tenths of clouds over less than 6 tenths clouds at height nn (reported cloud height)

less than 6 tenths of high clouds
K.2: less than 6 tenths of high clouds, less than 6 tenths of lower clouds at height nn (reported cloud height)

less than 6 tenths of high thick clouds

at least 6 but less than 10 tenths covered by low thin clouds

at least 6 but less than 10 tenths covered by high thin clouds

at least 6 but less than 10 tenths covered by low clouds
5.2: 6-9 tenths clouds over less than 6 tenths clouds at height nn (reported cloud height)
5.5: 6-9 tenths clouds over less 6-9 tenths lower clouds

at least 6 but less than 10 tenths covered by high clouds
N.2: 6-9 tenths high clouds, less than 6 tenths lower clouds at height nn (reported cloud height)
N.5: 6-9 tenths high clouds, 6-9 tenths lower clouds

at least 6 but less than 10 tenths covered by low thick clouds

at least 6 but less than 10 tenths covered by high thick clouds

10 tenths covered by low thin clouds

10 tenths covered by high thin clouds

8.2: 10 tenths clouds over less than 6 tenths clouds at height nn (reported cloud height)
8.5: 10 tenths clouds over 6-9 tenths lower clouds

Q.2: 10 tenths high clouds, less than 6 tenths lower clouds at height nn (reported cloud height)
Q.5: 10 tenths high clouds, 6-9 tenths lower clouds
